description: Krissy Lynn messes with the wrong police officer when she tries to bribe her way out of a traffic violation. Her arrogance gets her thrown in a cell on more serious charges and left at the mercy of one pissed off and perverted cop, James Deen. Watch this stuck up business woman get completely humiliated and stripped of all her rights while she's bound, sucks cock and fucked in the ass by the man in uniform!
title: Bribing an Officer: Business Woman Arrested and Ass Fucked in Bondage!
